ai-kp1:1.1_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-kp1:2.1_0: I take refuge in the Buddha,
ai-kp1:2.2_0: I go to the Dhamma for refuge
ai-kp1:2.3_0: I go to the Saṅgha for refuge
ai-kp1:3.1_0: For a second time I go to the Buddha for refuge
ai-kp1:3.2_0: for the second time I take refuge in the Teaching,
ai-kp1:3.3_0: for the second time I take refuge in the Sangha.
ai-kp1:4.1_0: For a third time I go to the Buddha for refuge
ai-kp1:4.2_0: for the third time I take refuge in the Teaching,
ai-kp1:4.3_0: for the third time I take refuge in the Sangha.
